channel.title: Altar not working
channel.description:
I lost my prayer and tried to restore by spawning an altar, i used it and... nothing happend [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=drcxht&s=7]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=drcxht&s=7[/url] can anyone help me? :]
I downloaded and used this source, its blank [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,431823.msg3169823.html#msg3169823]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,431823.msg3169823.html#msg3169823[/url] all i did was add an altar (409) and.. it doesnt work :/

item.title: Altar not working
item.dc:creator: @xxsaxx12 xxsaxx12
item.description:
@xxsaxx12 wrote:

[quote=“Sagi, post:4, topic:368815”][quote author=xxsaxx12 link=topic=464948.msg3400035#msg3400035 date=1289828759]

Post your altar code.
[/quote] 409

he dint meant object id, he asked code as in like
case 409:
…
break;

I lost my prayer and tried to restore by spawning an altar, i used it and… nothing happend
http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=drcxht&s=7 can anyone help me? :]

does it usually works? if not, then you need to define it this the code i use to define it in [PI]

		case 409:
		case 4859:
		case 2640:
			if(c.playerLevel[5] < c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])) {
				c.startAnimation(645);
				c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]);
				c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points.");
				c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You already have full prayer points.");
			}
			break;

This is [PI] code, so if you got errors don’t panic, try converting them.[/quote]not pro or anything but where in client.java does this go? :3 p.s… could you help with making ::starter only a one time thing? i tried searching but nothing worked

Read full topic

item.title: Altar not working
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

[quote=“xxsaxx12, post:3, topic:368815”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=464948.msg3399922#msg3399922 date=1289804581]
Post your altar code.
[/quote] 409[/quote]
he dint meant object id, he asked code as in like
case 409:
…
break;

[quote=“xxsaxx12, post:1, topic:368815”]I lost my prayer and tried to restore by spawning an altar, i used it and… nothing happend
http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=drcxht&s=7 can anyone help me? :][/quote]
does it usually works? if not, then you need to define it this the code i use to define it in [PI]

		case 409:
		case 4859:
		case 2640:
			if(c.playerLevel[5] < c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])) {
				c.startAnimation(645);
				c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]);
				c.sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points.");
				c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You already have full prayer points.");
			}
			break;

This is [PI] code, so if you got errors don’t panic, try converting them.
